attributes.action: Stop planning permission being given for anymore unsightly flats and houses being built in Manchester
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new houses and flats that are rising up in Manchester are an eyesore and so out of character with Manchester.  This needs to be re-assessed before any more damage is done to our beautiful city

rejection.details: Planning is a local issue, and as such this is a matter that should be raised foremost with your local council
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
